title: Riot servers aren't saving my keybindings.
body:
Every time I finish a match I have to rebind everything from the default. Just to complete another match and do it all over again.

How do I fix this? _Can I fix this?_

replies.body:
Hmmmmm this might be caused by some kind of corruption in your configuration files. Let's go through and reset those files to see if that fixes it!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Hit me up if you're still having problems with those keybindings!
